import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline
import seaborn as sns

l=ds.flavor_profile
sns.set_style('darkgrid')
plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))
sns.countplot(x='flavor_profile',data=ds,order=ds.flavor_profile.value_counts().index.tolist())
plt.yticks(fontsize=12)

source.5947ae36:
ds['ingredients']

ingredients=[]
for i in range(len(ds['ingredients'])):
    text=ds['ingredients'][i].split(',')
    text=','.join(text) 
    ingredients.append(text)
    text=' '.join(ingredients)
text
source.1d64efba:
wordcloud = WordCloud(width=800,height=800,background_color='white',min_font_size=4).generate(text)
plt.figure(figsize = (10, 10), facecolor = None)

plt.imshow(wordcloud) 
plt.axis("off") 
plt.tight_layout(pad = -1) 
  
plt.show()
source.754afdbe:
ing=pd.DataFrame(data=l,index=(range(491)))
ingredients=ing.T[0].reset_index()
ingredients.rename(columns={'index':'ingredients',0:'No of times'},inplace=True)
P=ingredients.sort_values('No of times',ascending=False)[0:15]
plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))
sns.barplot(y='ingredients',x='No of times',data=P)
plt.xticks(fontsize=12)
plt.yticks(fontsize=12)
plt.xlabel('No of Times',fontsize=12)
plt.ylabel('ingredients',fontsize=12)
plt.title('Most Used Ingredients',weight='bold',fontsize=14)
source.d2ebf1b5:
snak=ds[ds['course']=='snack'].sort_values('cook_time')[1:10]
plt.figure(figsize=(8,10))
sns.barplot(x='cook_time',y='name',data=snak)
plt.xticks(fontsize=11)
plt.yticks(fontsize=11)
plt.xlabel('Course',fontsize=11)
plt.ylabel('Count',fontsize=11)
plt.title('Top Ten snaks with less preparation Time',weight='bold',fontsize=14)

source.3fa77b5e: # All Visulizations are made with the help of **seaborn and Matplot**. if you do like then please upvote
source.1bfc7023: We Find 88.6 % vegetarians and 11.37 % Non vegetarina in the Data
source.0f885240: To Convert the list into the dict based on their frequancy we have used the Counter from collections
source.ca3c8b1b: After exploring the data we have also found that there are values -1 in flavor_profile, state and region. Hence we have replaced the string -1 wit NaN values.
source.5b57111a: We have one null value at the region . Let explore and impute with some meaningfull in sightsdata. The region was missing for the Uttar Pradesh state. As we know the UP belongs to the North. We can replace the Null value with the North
source.650b8a18: In India Most of the People prefer the Spicy Food followed by the Sweet
source.388e2294: Converting the all the ingredients into the one full string after that we have splited the string to the list so that it can be used for our analysis
source.c6c0e284: In Preap Time and Cook Time we have -1 as the values which is not possible so let us consider the same as the Null values. Therefore, replacing the -1 with the Null Values
source.775a9d68: Impted the Null(NaN) Values so that the -1 will be excluded from  our analysis
source.ceb3bc12: #                                         loading the Data set from the kaggle
source.f04ef362: Total 30 and 28 null values in the Prep_time and Cook_time. Before imputing Null values with mean/meadian or mode let us check the distribution of the values. The Distribution of the histogram is rightly sckewed so imputing the Values with the median
